title: फ़ैक्ट-चेक: पुणे में हुई मॉक ड्रिल का वीडियो असली COVID-19 पेशेंट का बताकर वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
Corona patients have started appearing in public places on the streets of Pune 😢

 The situation is dire, kindly please take care of yourself and your family

 Stay safe …🙏🏻#corona#punepic.twitter.com/Qr7UWBEyW5
